              [
                " is that Canvas actually orders the display to draw a 2 pixel wide line from "

              ["4.0", [["c"]]],
              [" to "],
              ["6.0", [["c"]]],
              [". It also colors the line lighter than the defined "],
              ["black", [["c"]]],
              [
                ". This strange drawing behavior is “anti-aliasing” and it helps Canvas avoid drawing strokes that look jagged."
